ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: **Help Needed!**
ygData.msgSnippet: Schnauzer, Sadly, no, there is no way to speed it up, except to get a faster connection. Verant is constantly improving Everquest. The stuff that is taking
ygData.messageBody:
Schnauzer,

Sadly, no, there is no way to speed it up, except to get a faster
connection. Verant is constantly "improving" Everquest. The stuff that is
taking forever for you to download would be all the patches and upgrades
that they have done to the game since the disk you bought was created. There
is a *lot* of it, too -- I know just what you are talking about, because I
recently had to re-install the game.

The only solution other than a faster connection is patience, grasshopper =)

----- Original Message -----
From: "schnauzer450" <schnauzer450@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, March 03, 2002 12:12 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: **Help Needed!**


> I got the DirectX 8.1 but when i go to try to play it it dowloads
> stuff that takes for ever anyway to speed it up?
